verses.plain: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.

tokens.t: Great
the
, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God,
the mountain of his holiness.

verses.plain: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.

tokens.t: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth,
mount Zion,
the sides of the north, the city of the great King.

verses.plain: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.

tokens.t: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.

verses.plain: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.

tokens.t: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.

verses.plain: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.

tokens.t: They saw
so they marvelled; they were troubled,
hasted away.

verses.plain: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.

tokens.t: Fear took hold upon them there,
pain, as of a woman in travail.

verses.plain: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.

tokens.t: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.

verses.plain: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.

tokens.t: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the
of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.

verses.plain: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.

tokens.t: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.

verses.plain: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.

tokens.t: According to thy name, O God, so
thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.

verses.plain: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.

tokens.t: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.

verses.plain: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.

tokens.t: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.

verses.plain: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.

tokens.t: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell
to the generation following.

verses.plain: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.

tokens.t: For this God
our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide
unto death.
